metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000164 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: gunicorn version 19.4.5 contains a CWE-113: Improper Neutralization of CRLFSequences in HTTP Headers vulnerability in "process_headers" function in"gunicorn/http/wsgi.py" that can result in an attacker causing the serverto return arbitrary HTTP headers. This vulnerability appears to have beenfixed in 19.5.0.

criterions.comment: gunicorn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
